## Subsetting columns using select() function

```{r}
select(mpg, model, year)
```

```{r}
trk = slice(mpg, 56:89)
select(trk, model, year)
```

```{r}
select(mpg, contains("isp"))
```

```{r}
filter(mpg, (year == 2008 | cyl >= 6))
```
